# UISplitViewController.DisplayModeButtonVisibility.always

**Case**

A constant that allows the display mode button to always appear.

## Declaration

```swift
case always
```

## Discussion

With this behavior, the display mode button can appear even if [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISplitViewController/presentsWithGesture] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Constants

- **UISplitViewController.DisplayModeButtonVisibility.automatic**: A constant that automatically determines the visibility of the display mode button.
- **UISplitViewController.DisplayModeButtonVisibility.never**: A constant that prevents the display mode button from appearing.
